nodes.text: The Skirmish at Shintel was a minor engagement between the New Republic CR90 corvette FarStar and the Steel Fist, a modified YT-1300 light freighter operated by the bounty hunter gang Qulok's Fist. After being lured to the Shintel system through false intelligence, the FarStar was infected with a computer virus that blew out the ship's hyperdrive. Qulok's Fist, hired by Moff Kentor Sarne, attacked the vessel as it was stranded, making several fast attack runs before withdrawing.
